experience.description: Infrastructure and automation specialist supporting mission-critical toll collection systems.
achievements: Developed C# security monitoring application for fraud prevention across toll systems
Automated reporting workflows with Python, saving 5+ hours per week
Built PowerShell automation framework for batch user provisioning (100+ users)
Primary Domain Administrator managing 200+ workstations
Reduced ticket processing time by 75% through automation
Manage Linux production servers with Dynatrace monitoring
Coordinate vendor communications for hardware and software upgrades

experience.description: Enterprise IT support for a national retail chain with 700+ stores.
achievements: Supported 5,000+ end users across corporate headquarters and retail locations
Maintained 99.5% SLA compliance for ticket resolution
Built Python automation for ticket escalation, reducing response time by 35%
Created PowerShell diagnostic tools for common issues
Managed hybrid identity across Active Directory, Okta, and Office 365
Trained and mentored new team members
Developed technical documentation and knowledge base articles

experience.description: Founded and operated a consumer packaged goods company producing nootropic energy shots.
achievements: Created caffeine + L-theanine nootropic formula from scratch
Built brand identity, packaging, and marketing materials
Appeared on local television twice to promote the product
Sold thousands of units at $2 per bottle through direct sales
Advanced to buyer meetings with VitaminShoppe (national distribution)
Managed complete supply chain from commercial kitchen facility
Built everything solo while attending college full-time
experience.note: Business ended when commercial kitchen partner (Pilotworks) shut down unexpectedly, collapsing supply chain.
